title: Proposal workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a proposal.

The proposal workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase. For more information about the out-of-the-box business rules defined for the proposal workflow, see Proposal process - Business rules.

Metaphase: Refinement

The first metaphase in the proposal's lifecycle, where the proposal enters into the Compose phase.

Phase Transition Description
Compose Manual

Compose is the starting point for proposals. The result of the phase is the successful creation of a proposal.

  • When the proposal is ready for review, the proposal creator can manually transition the proposal to the Review phase.
  • If the proposal isn't valid, the proposal creator can also manually transition the proposal to the Abandon phase.

Next phase: Review or Abandon

Metaphase: Assessment

Proposal reviewer reviews and prioritizes proposals in this phase. The proposal reviewer also needs to decide how to proceed with the proposal from one of the following actions:

  • Approve this proposal
  • Reject this proposal
  • Transition the proposal back to the Compose phase so that the proposal creator can provide more information
Phase Transition Description
Review Automatic
  • The proposal is automatically transitioned to the Close phase if the review decision is Reject or Approve.
  • The proposal automatically transitioned back to the Compose phase if the review decision is Need more information.

Next phase: Close or return to Compose

Metaphase: Done (End)

The final stage in the workflow. Proposals are completed or returned to the Compose phase.

Phase Transition Description
Close None

The proposal is completed.

Next phase: None
Abandon None or manual

The proposal is abandoned by the proposal creator and is inactive.

The proposal creator can manually transition the proposal back to the Compose phase if the proposal creator wants to reopen the proposal.

Next phase: None or return to Compose
